item.title: How Tariffs Harm the Heartland
item.description: Indiana is a trade and manufacturing powerhouse. Tariffs from Washington could do real damage.

item.title: America’s Enemies Are Rooting for the Death of the National Endowment for Democracy
item.description: Some of the loudest voices applauding NED’s struggles are those who wish to see freedom fail. That should tell us everything we need to know.

item.title: The Twisted Life Lessons of The Wild Robot
item.description: Animation used for treating adults as children.

item.title: Germany Doubling Down on Democratic Deficits
item.description: In the wake of JD Vance’s challenge to be better democrats, Germany’s incoming chancellor does the opposite.

item.title: The More the Merrier: Against the Idea of ‘Too Much’ Consumer Choice
item.description: Thoughts on Netflix and the supermarket cereal aisle.
